title: Is this a picture of World Trade Center tourists on September 11th?
subtitle: The refrigerated image appears to be taken by an unlucky tourist disguised at the World Trade Center on September 11th before a plane crashed into it.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: The photograph was taken by an unlucky tourist disguised on the surface of the surveillance ship at the World Trade Center Tower on 11 September, seconds before a hijacked aircraft crashed into the building.
